keyMoments.title: Zoro vs Eric Battle Begins
keyMoments.description: Zoro confronts Eric in the underground ruins, taking him on in single combat to protect his crewmates and buy them time to escape with Apis and Ryu.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's role as the crew's combat specialist and his willingness to sacrifice his safety for his friends.

keyMoments.title: Tactical Strike Against Eric
keyMoments.description: Zoro throws a stick that strikes Eric's legs, preventing the mercenary from leaping onto the cart and catching the escaping crew.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's tactical thinking and resourcefulness even without his swords in hand.

keyMoments.title: Deduces True Dragon's Nest Location
keyMoments.description: Through careful analysis of the ancient ceiling paintings and historical evidence, Nami deduces that the Dragon's Nest was never on Lost Island but was actually located at Warship Island and has since sunk beneath the sea.
keyMoments.significance: This is a major turning point in the arc that solves the central mystery. It showcases Nami's intelligence, analytical skills, and value to the crew beyond navigation.
keyMoments.quote: The Dragon's Nest wasn't on this island... it was back at Warship Island, but it sank into the sea!

keyMoments.title: Kama Kama no Kamaitachi Debut
keyMoments.description: Eric unleashes his signature Devil Fruit technique for the first time, the Kama Kama no Kamaitachi, releasing devastating razor-sharp wind slashes from his elongated fingernails that can slice through solid rock.
keyMoments.significance: This establishes Eric's full combat capabilities and demonstrates the destructive power of the Kama Kama no Mi Devil Fruit.

keyMoments.title: Full Wind Slash Arsenal Revealed
keyMoments.description: Throughout his battle with Zoro, Eric showcases multiple techniques from his Kama Kama no Mi, including Kama Kama no Tsumujikaze and various Kamaitachi variations, fully revealing his fighting style.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Eric as a formidable Devil Fruit user with a diverse moveset.

keyMoments.title: Eric Infiltrates the Ruins
keyMoments.description: Eric tracks the Straw Hats to the underground ruins and overhears their conversation about the true location of the Dragon's Nest at Warship Island.
keyMoments.significance: Eric gains critical intelligence that will drive the final confrontation of the arc.

abilities.description: Eric releases a single small but powerful air blade from his sharp nails that can slice through solid rock.
Eric releases a powerful air blade that slashes the enemy multiple times upon contact, strong enough to cut through rock.
Eric's ultimate technique where he slashes many times, releasing multiple air blades before unleashing a powerful whirlwind of razor air that effortlessly slices through solid rock.

relationships.description: Eric works as a mercenary for Nelson Royal, though he shows little loyalty and will betray him for personal gain.
Eric clashes with Zoro multiple times throughout the arc, culminating in their battle in the ruins.

evolutionMoments.description: Eric and Zoro engage in direct combat in the underground ruins.

reveals.information: Full arsenal of Kama Kama no Mi techniques including Kamaitachi, Tsumujikaze, and Kamaitachi Midareuchi

keyMoments.title: Learns True Dragon's Nest Location
keyMoments.description: Apis is present when Nami reveals that the Dragon's Nest was at Warship Island all along. This information is crucial for helping Ryu return home.
keyMoments.significance: This discovery gives Apis and the crew the information they need to help Ryu fulfill his final wish.

keyMoments.title: Escapes Ruins with Crew
keyMoments.description: Apis escapes the ruins with the Straw Hats on a cart, staying with Ryu as they flee from Eric and head toward the ship.
keyMoments.significance: Apis continues to show her dedication to protecting and helping Ryu.

relationships.description: Apis has formed a deep bond with Ryu and is dedicated to helping him return to the Dragon's Nest.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Ancient Dragon Paintings
keyMoments.description: Luffy is the first to notice the collapsed ceiling sections featuring paintings of Sennenryu dragons, bringing them to the crew's attention.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy's observation provides the key evidence that allows Nami to solve the mystery of the Dragon's Nest location.
keyMoments.quote: Look at these paintings! They're of the Sennenryu!
